sentences.english: Objective To determine diosgenin content in Jingangteng soft capsule by RP-HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立金剛藤軟膠囊中薯蕷皁苷元的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: Objective To study water-soluble constituents of Dioscorea zingiberensis in order to seek active components.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究盾葉薯蕷的水溶性化學成分，尋找活性物質。

sentences.english: Objective To study the therapeutic effects of methyl protodioscin on myocardial infarction in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究薯蕷皁苷元對大鼠急性心肌缺血的治療作用。

sentences.english: A study on numerical taxonomy of Dioscoreaceae plants in Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 浙江省薯蕷科植物的數量分類研究。

sentences.english: Tropical american yam with small yellow-skinned edible tubers .
sentences.chinese: 熱帶美洲薯蕷科植物，有黃皮的可食塊莖。

sentences.english: In botany, Barbasco (Lonchocarpus urucu) is part of the Fabaceae (or Leguminosae) family.
sentences.chinese: 在植物學裏，多花薯蕷屬於豆科。

sentences.english: Dioscorea zingiberensis Wright CH, as a special species of Chinese plant, is an important source of steroid hormones.
sentences.chinese: 盾葉薯蕷是中國特有的植物，是甾體激素的重要來源。

sentences.english: Potato is a tropical American yam with small yellow- skinned edible tubers.
sentences.chinese: 馬鈴薯是熱帶美洲薯蕷科植物，有黃皮的可食塊莖。

sentences.english: Methods To identify diosgenin in Jidesheng antivenornous tablets by TLC.
sentences.chinese: 方法用TLC法鑑別季德勝蛇藥片中的薯蕷皁苷元。

sentences.english: Objective To introduce the extraction, isolation and analysis of diosgenin.
sentences.chinese: 目的介紹薯蕷皁苷元主要的提取和分離分析方法。

sentences.english: The Dioscorea zingiberensis Wright is an important medicine source plant, having the higher economy value.
sentences.chinese: 盾葉薯蕷是重要藥源植物，具有較高的經濟價值。

sentences.english: Objective To study the liposoluble components from the aerial parts of Dioscorea nipponica. Makino.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究穿龍薯蕷地上部分油狀物的化學成分。

cicada slough/fig. to free oneself/to extricate oneself from
Ningpo figwort (Scrophularia ningpoensis)/root of Ningpo figwort (used in TCM)
to dry over a fire/to roast
black-boned chicken/silky fowl/silkie/Gallus gallus domesticus Brisson
dried fruit of immature citron or trifoliate orange (used in TCM)
variant of 黃檗|黄檗[huang2 bo4]
to relieve (cold, rheumatic pain etc)/lit. to dispel pathogenic wind (TCM)
King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
